subject: Return
description_text:
Order # SSN5863

I received the product today. Installed them and was immediately
disappointed with the product. The resistance felt very grindy for lack of
a better word and I actually had to alter my aluminum profile rig in order
for them to fit.

I will return everything as it came. If you could please send a return
label I’d appreciate it.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jordan Jones,    If the brake feels too stiff with the red damper, you can remove the 10mm travel limiter/spacer inside the black brake spring. This will increase the brake travel and make the pedal feel easier to control.  Also, during normal use, you don’t need to press the brake all the way to the bottom every time. Simply recalibrate the pedals in SIMSONN Manager and follow the calibration process, pressing the pedal with a comfortable, reasonable force. After calibration, you should be able to achieve effective braking with normal pedal pressure.

I already packed them back into the box. They didn’t even fit on my rig
properly either. I had to drill holes in my sim rig and even then it still
wasn’t a great fit. I would prefer a return so I can just stick with what I
originally had.
